Important Updates Regarding COVID-19

Laws and Legal Resources Related to Coronavirus

Stay up to date on the latest legal developments arising from the COVID-19 pandemic, including changes associated with employment law, evictions and foreclosures, business assistance, taxes, immigration, debts & bankruptcy, criminal proceedings, family law, and personal injury cases. We have also assembled 50-state resources on coronavirus and the law regarding topics including the following:

Featured Site of the Month

Our friends at [Law Offices of ABC Lawyers] in [Anytown, CA],
recently launched [their] Justia Elevate website: [website.com]

At Justia, we build law firm websites that are responsive, mobile-friendly, and AMP enabled. Our commitment to high-quality, relevant websites will help you attract clients in the practice areas and locations most important to your firm. We also offer Justia Premium Membership on the Justia & LII Lawyer Directories and PPC Management.

If you're interested in our website and SEO services, Justia Premium Membership opportunities, PPC management, or if you would just like to learn more about what we have to offer, contact one of our marketing specialists today.

Justia Lawyer Rating and Reviews

Featured Lawyer

[Nostrud officia duis]

[ANYTOWN, CA]

Each month, we are featuring a Justia Connect member who has achieved a perfect 10 Justia Lawyer Rating!

Justia Lawyer Rating and Reviews is a system designed to allow lawyers to share valuable insight from peers and colleagues personally familiar with that lawyer’s work. Lawyers who have been reviewed by their peers receive a Justia Lawyer Rating, which is a numerical representation of these peer reviews.

These lawyers also earn the Justia Lawyer Rating Badge to display on their Justia Lawyer Directory profile and other marketing materials, such as websites and blogs. Our research shows that the Justia Lawyer Rating Badge is even the most frequently used search filter in the Justia Lawyer Directory.!

Read More

Justia Legal Jobs Newsletter

The Justia Legal Jobs newsletter features job listings from across the US for lawyers, law students, and other legal professionals. This newsletter is free for job seekers!
